# [_exenv_](https://github.com/mururu/exenv) Elixir environment/version manager plugin for [Oh My Fish][omf-link]. ## Install > _Note_: You need to have `exenv` installed. ```fish $ omf install exenv ``` ## Configuration If you have a custom exenv root, you can add the following to your `~/.config/fish/init.fish` file before sourcing Oh My Fish. ``` set -gx EXENV_ROOT #path ``` # License [MIT][mit] Â© [janlindblom][author] [mit]: http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT [author]: http://github.com/janlindblom [contributors]: https://github.com/janlindblom/plugin-exenv/graphs/contributors [omf-link]: https://www.github.com/oh-my-fish/oh-my-fish [license-badge]: https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-007EC7.svg?style=flat-square
